headline.main: VICHY MINISTRIES CITE PENAL POWER; Production Bureau Stresses Right to Fine and Suspend Without Move in Court

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Oct. 23 -- The office of Francois Lehideux, Secretary of State for Industrial Production, issued today a communnication to stress the activities of the department, and it made clear that M. Lehideux, by virtue of his office, may impose a fine of 1,500,000 francs as well as suspend manufacturers and business men for a term as long as one year.
abstract: Indus Production, Agr and Supplies Depts' penal powers without ct recourse discussed; Natl Council ends work on drafting new const; denies rumor it favors repub
